data.name: Battle vs Chess - Art & Music Premium Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Battle vs. Chess Art & Music Premium Pack is the perfect expansion for all players and allows deep insights into a fantastic chess universe.

This Art & Music Premium Pack brings together the most striking artistic impressions of the game, giving you a fabulously entertaining trip into the wonderful world of Battle vs. Chess. The Digital Artbook and the Official Soundtrack provide an extraordinary opportunity to plunge into a world of breathtaking detail!

Digital Artbook (70 pages, PDF) and six 4K Hi-Res Wallpaper

What’s that? Ah, so you're into video games and fantasy art? OK, friends, then this elaborately designed art book is right up your street! It has 70 pages of
exclusive insights into the fantastic universe of “Battle vs. Chess”. Unpublished concept sketches straight from the developers, high-resolution rendered works of art and countless other fascinating detailed views already make this book a red-hot collector's edition!

Battle vs. Chess Original Soundtrack - Playlist:

  • 01. Fight for your rights -- [03:13]
  • 02. Flying Vibes -- [03:01]
  • 03. Dark Castle -- [03:06]
  • 04. Patriots Dream -- [03:45]
  • 05. Angels Garden -- [02:57]
  • 06. Asura Temple -- [02:46]
  • 07. Dawn in the City -- [02:28]
  • 08. Dark Desert -- [03:57]
  • 09. Main Theme -- [02:25]
  • 10. Signs on the Sand -- [02:24]
  • 11. The Witches -- [02:25]
  • 12. Through the Aages -- [02:46]
  • 13. Open seas -- [03:13]
  • 14. On the shore -- [03:50]
  • 15. The Rock -- [03:38]
  • 16. Wind and Water -- [03:50]
  • 17. DLC Bonus A -- [03:13]
  • 18. DLC Bonus B -- [03:50]
  • 19. DLC Bonus C -- [03:38]
  • 20. DLC Bonus D -- [03:50]

data.short_description: This Art & Music Premium Pack brings together the most striking artistic impressions of the game, giving you a fabulously entertaining trip into the wonderful world of Battle vs. Chess. The Digital Artbook and the Official Soundtrack provide an extraordinary opportunity to plunge into a world of breathtaking detail!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor:2.0 GHz Single Core CPU
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Graphics card with Shader 3.0 support and 128 MB RAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:1 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard DirectX compliant
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection, Battle vs. Chess Main Game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64x2
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Graphics card with Shader 3.0 support and 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:1 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard DirectX compliant
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection, Battle vs. Chess Main Game

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Mac OS X 10.6.1
  • Processor:2.0 GHz Single Core CPU
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:OS compatible Graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Hard Drive:1 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard, OS compliant
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection, Battle vs. Chess Main Game
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Mac OS X 10.6.1
  • Processor:2.0 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:OS compatible Graphics card with 128 MB RAM
  • Hard Drive:1 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard, OS compliant
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection, Battle vs. Chess Main Game

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or SteamOS
  • Processor:2.0 GHz Single Core CPU
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:OS compatible Graphics card
  • Hard Drive:1 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard, OS compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection, Battle vs. Chess Main Game
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or SteamOS
  • Processor:2.0 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:OS compatible Graphics card
  • Hard Drive:1 GB HD space
  • Sound:Soundcard, OS compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection, Battle vs. Chess Main Game
